Module es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction
Package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction.xml.definition

Class PropertiesFileProcessingStepParameter

java.lang.Object
es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter
es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpentityextraction.xml.definition.PropertiesFileProcessingStepParameter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProcessingStepParameter
public final class PropertiesFileProcessingStepParameter
extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter
Parameter for specifying the properties to pass to GetPatternsFromDataMultiClass. The keys of the properties file are not that well documented, and the class code itself is a poorly commented, hard to read god class with more than 3600 lines of code, but there are examples included with the CoreNLP distribution.

Some properties should not be included in a custom properties file, either because they are generated or assumed to have a fixed value. These properties are:

  • file (automatically set to the temporary document file)
  • fileFormat (automatically set to ser for efficiency)
  • useTargetNERRestriction (assumed to be true)
  • useTargetParserParentRestriction (assumed to be false)
  • seedWordsFiles (deduced from SeedWordsDirectoryProcessingStepParameter)
  • patternType (assumed to be "SURFACE")
  • preserveSentenceSequence (assumed to be false)
  • savePatternsWordsDir (assumed to be true)
  • loadSavedPatternsWordsDir (automatically set to true or false)
  • patternsWordsDir (automatically set to the temporary model folder)
  • computeAllPatterns (should be true for consistency)
  • identifier (assumed to be textproc)
  • outDir (automatically set to the appropriate temporary folder)

Additionally, the following properties are added:

  • nerModelPaths: comma-separated list of URL or file paths to the NER model to use for NERCombinerAnnotator. See IOUtils.getInputStreamFromURLOrClasspathOrFileSystem(String).
  • fineGrainedRegexnerMapping: the value to pass to the mapping property of TokensRegexNERAnnotator when instantiating a NERCombinerAnnotator. If not provided, a default value will be used.
  • applyFineGrainedRegexner: the value to pass to the ner.applyFineGrained property of NERCombinerAnnotator when instantiating it. If not provided, a default value will be used.

See the bundled default properties file and the see also section for more details.

Author:
Alejandro González García
